name: ABCDforKids
0:
”Alexa, open Learn Alphabets”
”Alexa, Launch Learn Alphabets”
”Alexa, Learn Alphabets”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn alphabets
des:
It has been observed that ever since Alexa has entered our homes the kids have really taken to it.The idea of having a device which can speak to them is fascinating for the kids.
This skill aims to use this connect to teach basic alphabets & numbers to the kids.Invoking the skills and interacting with it is very easy.

Invocation : Alexa launch learn alphabets

Interactive phrases
Tell all alphabets -- Alexa will go through all of the English alphabets

Tell all numbers -- Alexa will tell all the numbers form 1 to 10 .Kids can join in

Tell us a poem -- Alexa sings a poem for the kids

A for -- Alexa responds with A for apple.

Similarly for all other alphabets.

This is a fun skill which will make learning English very interesting for the kids
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
